details.text: Global interconnect for 6 global loads and 5 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 6 global loads and 5 global stores.

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.
The following loops are nested at depth greater than 3. Reducing the number and depth of these nested loops will save area:

1 compute unit.
12 loops nested 3 levels deep or more.

Register,
1 reg, 3 width by 1 depth,
1 reg, 32 width by 1 depth

Additional information.text: Requested size 4096 bytes, implemented size 4096 bytes, stall-free, 16 reads and 18 writes.
Banked on bits 3, 4, 5 into 8 separate banks.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
Requested size 4096 bytes, implemented size 65536 bytes, replicated 16 times total, stall-free, 67 reads and 2 writes.
Replicated 16 times to efficiently support multiple accesses. To reduce this replication factor, reduce number of read and write accesses.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
Requested size 128 bytes, implemented size 128 bytes, stall-free, 1 read and 1 write.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.

details.text: Private memory was split into multiple parts due to optimizations. See below for details on each part.

Additional information.text: Requested size 128 bytes, implemented size 128 bytes, stall-free, 2 reads and 3 writes.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
Requested size 128 bytes, implemented size 128 bytes, stall-free, 2 reads and 1 write.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
Requested size 4096 bytes, implemented size 32768 bytes, replicated 8 times total, stall-free, 2 reads and 2 writes.
8 independent copies of this memory were created to enable simultaneous execution of 8 loop iterations defined at  (%L)
You can reduce the number of copies of this memory by limiting the concurrency of its loop; see the OpenCL Programming Guide for details.
